function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of comprehensive scientific studies on COVID-19 impact on human development and well-being","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of the disease's impact on human development and happiness, leading to ineffective interventions and strategies","Mitigation":"Initiate comprehensive scientific studies and evidence synthesis, communicate research findings to multi-stakeholders, and develop policy briefs for government action","Technologies":"Research tools and data analysis platforms for evidence synthesis","People":"Helping professionals, their families, and communities","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Weak community-based crisis risk management","Impact":"Inability to effectively manage and mitigate the spread of COVID-19 at the community level, leading to increased transmission and impact on well-being","Mitigation":"Strengthen community-based crisis risk management, learn from empirical evidence, and replicate best practices","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, data collection and analysis tools","People":"Local communities, public health agencies, and community leaders","Owner":"Local government, public health organizations, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of inter-sectoral collaboration and government agreements for COVID-19 control policies","Impact":"Inadequate coordination and collaboration in developing and implementing effective COVID-19 control policies, risking public health and well-being","Mitigation":"Promote inter-sectoral collaboration, develop agreements through coalitions, and facilitate government coordination","Technologies":"Communication and collaboration platforms, policy development and analysis tools","People":"Government agencies, public health officials, and policy makers","Owner":"Government agencies, international organizations, and public health institutions"}]}
